title: Lakewood  Physical Memory % Used (High)
query: Select average(memory.used/memory.total)*100 from `unixMonitor:Stats`where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood  Swap % Used (High)
query: SELECT average(swap.used/swap.total)*100 from `unixMonitor:Stats` where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood  Mem % Used (High)
query: SELECT average(memory.virtual/memory.total)*100 from `unixMonitor:Stats` where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood Prod TotalUsedCPU
query: Select average(cpu.system) + average(cpu.user) as TotalUsedCPU from `unixMonitor:Stats` where fullHostname LIKE 'lkwprod1.fhmc.local'

title: Lakewood Stats MemAct % Used
query: SELECT average(memory.virtual/memory.total)*100 from `unixMonitor:Stats` where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood Stats Swap % Used (High)
query: SELECT average(swap.used/swap.total)*100 from `unixMonitor:Stats` where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood Stats Physical Memory % Used (High)
query: SELECT average(memory.used/memory.total)*100 from `unixMonitor:Stats` where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood Stats Host Inode % Used (High)
query: SELECT average(inodesPercentUsed) from `unixMonitor:Disk` where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood Disk Mountpoint Inode % Used (High)
query: SELECT average(inodesPercentUsed) from `unixMonitor:Disk` where mountPoint !='/tmp' or hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET mountPoint, hostname

title: Lakewood Host Disk Used (High)
query: SELECT latest(used/total * 100) from `unixMonitor:Disk` where mountPoint !='/tmp' or hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET hostname

title: Lakewood Mountpoint Disk Used (High)
query: SELECT latest(used/total * 100) from `unixMonitor:Disk` where mountPoint != '/tmp' or hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' FACET mountPoint, hostname

title: Lakewood Stats CPU Load (High)
query: SELECT latest(`loadaverage.5Minute`) from `unixMonitor:Stats` where hostname LIKE '%lkw%' or fullHostname LIKE '%phtml%' and fullHostname not like '%uat%' and fullHostname != 'lkwprod1.fhmc.local' and fullHostname not like '%dev%' facet hostname

title: Memory Utilization
query: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) as 'Transaction Errors' FACET error.message
